https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oWHZdSSWiclgMUjVg3eYDBCbiAL.jpg A collection of 24 short four-and-a-half minutes films inspired by still images, including paintings and photographs. An experimental project made by filmmaker Abbas Kiarostami in the last three years of his life. 24 Frames
